    • ArrivalTimeByWalking

      public LocalDateTime ArrivalTimeByWalking(IStation stationDeparture, IStation stationDestination, LocalDateTime depTime)
      Description copied from interface: IPlanner
      calculate the estimated arrival time by walking between two Stations In the method, we need to firstly calculate the distance between the starting station and the destination station, then assume a constant walking speed, to generate the time required for walking, then get the estimated arrival time
      Specified by:
      ArrivalTimeByWalking in interface IPlanner
      Parameters:
      stationDeparture - - departure station
      stationDestination - - destination station
      depTime - - the current time
      Returns:
      a Time object represents the estimated arrival time by walking from the source station to the destination station
